nodes.text: In 3962 BBY, a battle was fought in the Inner Rim's Zel system between the Galactic Republic and Mandalorian Neo-Crusaders, who had invaded Republic space and sparked the Mandalorian Wars. The battle took place as a part of Mandalorian Triumph, a Mandalorian campaign to capture the Core World of Duro. One prong of this advance took the Mandalorian forces from their territory through the Ambria system and to Zel. The Mandalorians were victorious in the Zel system, from which they moved on to another victory at the planet of Commenor and continued to press Coreward.
The battle in the Zel system was mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry.
